Curator's comments: Although no silver portrait tetradrachms were produced by Cleopatra, she did follow her father's lead in producing silver drachms with her portrait. They were issued on two occasions, in the sixth and eleventh years of her rule (47/46 and 42/41 BC).
Bibliographic references: Svoronos 1904 / Τα Νομισματα του Κρατους των Πτολεμαιων (The Coins of the Ptolemaic Kings) (1853)
BMC Greek (Ptolemies) / Catalogue of Greek coins: the Ptolemies, kings of Egypt (p122.1)
Walker & Higgs 2001 / Cleopatra of Egypt: from History to Myth (178)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2013-2014, 12 Oct - 2 Feb, Centro Culturale Internazionale DART srl, Rome, Cleopatra, The Magic of Egypt
